item.title: Rust + Axum, from zero to hero: build a high‑performance Web server the LEGO way
item.description: A step‑by‑step Axum guide to build a modern high‑performance Web service: routing, path and query parameters, JSON, shared state, and middleware (tracing, CORS) with complete code samples and best practices.
